all_response:
Jax: POWs are locked up in the prison. You will need to free them. But be careful: the prison guards will be on high alert and you are likely to be discovered and pursued on your escape. To prevent being recaptured, you should carefully set some traps in the forest near the prison before the breakout, and then make your escape through the trees. The traps should hopefully catch some enemy soldiers and spook the rest to stop them going after you and allow you to escape.
Jax: You will need to disguise yourself as one of the guards to enter the prison carry a forged ID with you to enter the prison safely and free the POWs.
Jax: The clothing and fake ID for the disguise can be acquired from "Uncle Henry" at the tavern.
Jax: "Uncle Henry" is usually at the Crusty Tavern.
Jax: You should escape and set traps through the Bridewell Forest, which is closest to the prison and will provide cover quickly.
Jax: You should set pit traps along your escape route. While the soldiers will possess weapons to cut through nets, climbing out of a hole is a little more difficult!

all_response_exaplain: The previous responses from Jax did not explain how to enter the prison. This response addresses how to enter the prison or alleviates concerns about being unable to enter the prison. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed the issue of being unable to enter the prison.

Jax previously mentioned that entering the prison requires a disguise but did not explain where to acquire the necessary items for the disguise. This response addresses how to acquire the disguise or answers questions about the method of obtaining the disguise. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed the lack of information on how to obtain the disguise.

Jax mentioned that the disguise can be acquired from "Uncle Henry" but did not clarify where to find "Uncle Henry." This response addresses the question of where to find "Uncle Henry," specifying that he is usually at the Crusty Tavern. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed that there are multiple taverns and is unsure which one to visit.

There are multiple forests in the game scenario, and the previous response did not specify which forest to use for setting traps and escaping. This response addresses the question of which forest to use, specifying that it should be the Bridewell Forest and not the Primeval Forest or Tropical Rainforest. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed that there are multiple forests and is unsure which one to use.

There are two types of traps that can be set in the game. This response addresses the question of which type of trap to set, specifying that pit traps should be used instead of net traps. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed that there are multiple types of traps and is unsure which one to use for the escape.

all_response:
Jax: Citizens are trapped in the Fantasy Forest and cannot find their way out. You need to find them and lead them out of the forest. Before you enter the forest, you will need to take a map with you so that you can find your way out again, and you will need to know the magic of illuminating a person's essence to locate those lost in the forest.
Jax: A map of the Fantasy Forest can be obtained from "Uncle Henry" at the tavern in exchange for rare gems.
Jax: "Uncle Henry" is usually at the Crusty Tavern.
Jax: Henry will give you the map in exchange for a sapphire.
Jax: To learn the magic of illuminating a person's essence, you must go to Lily's Magic School.

all_response:
Jax: Citizens are trapped in the Mystical Forest and cannot find their way out. You will need to use tracking spells to locate those lost in the forest. need to find them and lead them out of the forest. Using tracking magic requires magic crystals, which are guarded by a powerful and vindictive dragon on the mountain. You will need to carefully stun the dragon with a magic spell to obtain the magic crystals.
Jax: The dragon guards the top of the West Snow Mountain.
Jax: You will be able to stun the dragon without harming it using your lightning magic.
Jax: You need to use psychic positioning to track the citizens. The other magical tracking spells are for flora and fauna.
Jax: The Mystical Forest is dangerous and entry is normally restricted by the knights. To enter, you must show a certificate of membership to the knight's guild.

all_response:
Jax: Your pet has been captured by an orc and is locked in its cave; you need to rescue it before it is eaten alive. There is an orc guarding the entrance of the cave. You can mix sleeping medicine into some of the orc's preferred food and then leave some at the entrance of the cave for it to eat. Once the orc is asleep, you can enter the cave and rescue your pet.
Jax: Orcs are known have a very low intelligence and are ravenous for oranges. They will pick up and eat any random oranges that cross their path.
Jax: The Yige Food Store is the only store to sell oranges and other fruits.
Jax: Qiqi Pharmacy sells sleeping medicine. Adding a little to the orange will make the orc sleep very soundly.
Jax: Your pet is locked in the Orc's lair in the Dongqi Mountain Cave.

all_response:
Jax: Your pet has been captured by orcs and is locked in a cave. You need to rescue it. There are orcs guarding the entrance of the cave. You can mix a sleeping potion into the food the orcs love and throw it at the cave entrance. The orcs will fall asleep after eating the food. Once the orcs are asleep, you can rescue your pet dog. Note that you will need to use a specific magical attack to destroy the cage inside the cave so that your pet dog can get out.
Jax: Orcs are known have a very low intelligence and are ravenous for oranges. They will pick up and eat any random oranges that cross their path.
Jax: The Yige Food Store is the only store to sell fruits.
Jax: Qiqi Pharmacy sells sleeping medicine. Adding a little to the orange will make the orcs sleep very soundly.
Jax: Your pet is locked in the Orcs' lair in the Dongqi Mountain Cave.
Jax: The cage is made of wood, so you will need to use fire magic to destroy it.

all_response:
Jax: Your pet has been captured by an orc and is locked in their cave. You need to rescue it before it is eaten alive. The orc will be watching their cave but you can present them with their favorite food, which unbeknownst to them will be laced with sleeping medicine. Once the orc is asleep, you can enter the cave and rescue your pet. After rescuing your dog, you should take it to the hospital for a check-up make sure the orc didn't harm it in any way.
Jax: Orcs are known have a very low intelligence and are ravenous for oranges. They will pick up and eat any random oranges that cross their path.
Jax: The Yige Food Store is the only store to sell oranges and other fruits.
Jax: Qiqi Pharmacy sells sleeping medicine. Adding a little to the orange will make the orc sleep very soundly.
Jax: Your pet is locked in the Orc's lair in the Dongqi Mountain Cave.
Jax: You should take your dog to the Round Table Veterinary Hospital for a check-up.
